doc.title: Bound by Envy!
doc.plot: Samantha is convinced that the only way Cindy could have beaten her in the Homecoming Queen contest was to cheat, so she leaves the beautiful blonde bound and gagged for the frat boys to find and ogle while she steals her crown. Cindy soon escapes and exacts her revenge, leaving her antagonist hogtied on her bed while she invites her friends and professors to view the helpless beauty. In other vignettes, two blonde babes leave a third bound and gagged as a prank, but are soon placed in a similar predicament; a perky babe is lured into a man's apartment and abducted; a secretary working overtime is bound and gagged by a ruthless criminal; a lovely lady just home from a memorable date is victimized by a burglar; a beautiful private detective is captured by the man she is investigating and three beautiful ladies struggle in their bonds while sitting side-by-side on a couch
